title: Lucky Break
contents: text | Play on a Traveller to allow them to make their next roll with a Boon.

title: Inspiration
contents: text | Play during combat to have all Travellers make all rolls with a Boon this round.
subtitle | We only have one shot at this. Itâ€™s all or nothing, gang!

title: Bad Break
contents: text | Play on an Enemy to force them to make their next roll with a Bane.

title: Bullseye
contents: text | Play to have a single Ranged attack do +2D damage.
subtitle | Great shot kid that was one in a million!

title: Deadly Blow
contents: text | Play to have a single Melee attack do +2D damage.
subtitle | That's gonna leave a mark!

title: Acrobatics
contents: text | Play to allow a single Traveller to ignore all negative consequences from Reactions this round.
subtitle | Nimble little minx, isn't she?

title: Last Stand
contents: text | Play to allow all Travellers to ignore all negative consequences from Reactions this round.

title: Epiphany
contents: text | Play on a Traveller to allow something they never understood before to suddenly 'click' and gain Level 1 in any Skill they choose for the remainder of this game session.

title: Hidden Stash
contents: text | Play to have a Traveller scrounge up a mundane necessity of some sort, such as food and water, a power pack, a box of ammo, enough money for a room, a usefull tool, etc.
subtitle | Huh, I forgot I had that!

title: Get a Clue
contents: text | Play this card for advice from the GM on how to resolve a current predicament or problem; to have a prisoner tell all they know; or to find all the clues or evidence in a particular scene.
subtitle | Wait! I have an idea!

title: Lucky Mag
contents: text | Play to give a Traveller's weapon a new Trait this round. Choose from Blast 3, Armor Piercing 3, Auto 3, Fire, Smart, Smasher, Stun, or Zero-G.

title: Malfunction
contents: text | Play to cause a device to malfunction in some way: a gun jams, a power cable breaks, etc. The device can be fixed by 1D x 10 minutes work and an appropriate Skill roll. If part of a larger device, like a vehicle or spacecraft, roll a Critical Hit instead.
subtitle | No, no, no!  Not Now!

title: Walk It Off
contents: text | Play to allow a Traveller to stay conscious after having their second attribute go to zero.

title: Noble Sacrifice
contents: text | Play when a nearby ally within 6m suffers damage to take the damage result yourself and the Travellers gain one Gambit.
subtitle | Taking one for the team!

title: Teamwork
contents: text | The Effect bonus of all Task Chain rolls is doubled this round. This applies to all allied characters.

title: Love Interest
contents: text | Play on a nonplayer character with at least a neutral attitude towards the Travellers. The target (eventually) falls in love with one of the Travellers. Which one? They may tag along on their adventures or help in various ways, but also get into trouble on occasion. Add them as an Contact.

title: Contact
contents: text | A Traveller finds a Contact or Ally from their past who helps them with their current situation.  Who are they?  Why are they here? How do they help you?
subtitle | Reggie you old scoundrel!  How have you been?

title: Turncoat
contents: text | A Traveller somehow convinces a foe to perform a small favor such as helping them escape, revealing the location of their boss, etc. Describe how they did it. (offered a deal, bribe, favor, etc.)
subtitle | So, how much are they paying you?

title: Betrayed
contents: text | A trusted friend turns against the Travellers, allying with your foes and spilling your secrets. Describe how they were turned and what they shared. Travellers gain 2 Gambits.
subtitle | Nick, you poisonous little snake!

title: Concierge Service
contents: text | Play on a Traveller to allow them to roll with a Boon when using these skills this session: Medic and Steward
subtitle | Right this way sir.  We have everything prepared just for you.

title: Merchant of Venus
contents: text | Play on a Traveller to allow them to roll with a Boon when using these skills this session: Broker and Streetwise
subtitle | Have I got a deal for you!

title: Smooth Talker
contents: text | Play on a Traveller to allow them to roll with a Boon when using these skills this session: Persuade and Diplomat

title: Rally to Me
contents: text | Play on a Traveller to allow them to roll with a Boon when using these skills this session: Tactics and Leadership
subtitle | We're gonna make it out of this.

title: Liason
contents: text | Play on a Traveller to allow them to roll with a Boon when using these skills this session: Admin and Advocate
subtitle | It's just red tape and bureaucracy. I love this stuff!

title: Way Finder
contents: text | Play on a Traveller to allow them to roll with a Boon when using these skills this session: Astrogate and Navigate
subtitle | Find a shortcut through time and space?  No problem.

title: Mend and Make
contents: text | Play on a Traveller to allow them to roll with a Boon when using these skills this session: Engineer and Mechanic
subtitle | Never tell them how long its really going to take.

title: Underworld Ties
contents: text | Play on a Traveller to allow them to roll with a Boon when using these skills this session: Carouse, Gambling, and Deception
subtitle | Maybe its time for a walk on the wild side.

title: Baby Driver
contents: text | Play on a Traveller to allow them to roll with a Boon when using these skills this session: Drive, Fly, Pilot, and Seafarer
subtitle | Once upon a pair of wheels, I hit the road and I'm gone!

title: Hide, Seek, and Explode
contents: text | Play on a Traveller to allow them to roll with a Boon when using these skills this session: Explosives and Stealth
subtitle | Keep quiet and stay in the shadows until the explosions start.

title: Survivor
contents: text | Play on a Traveller to allow them to roll with a Boon when using these skills this session: Survival, Recon, and Vacc Suit
subtitle | You can't just leave me here in the middle of nowhere!

title: Information Processing
contents: text | Play on a Traveller to allow them to roll with a Boon when using these skills this session: Investigate and Electronics
subtitle | Time to knock on doors, physical and virtual, and ask some questions.

title: Psionic Inspiration
contents: text | Play on a Traveller to allow them to roll with a Boon when using PSI Powers for the remainder of this encounter or scene.
subtitle | I think I've got this figured out!

title: Psionic Restoration
contents: text | Play on a Traveller to allow them to immediately recover 2D PSI points. Excess points last until used.

title: Professional Touch
contents: text | Play on a Traveller to allow them to roll with a Boon when using these skills this session: Animals, Art, Language, Science, and Profession
subtitle | Wait!  I had a job once where we did this.
